name: 陳玟心
objective:
本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟 TOEIC 測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
This course is designed to familiarize the students with TOEIC. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.
schedule:
Week 1: Holiday (No Class)
Week 2: TOEIC Introduction
Week 3: Introduction and Strategies to Part 1
Week 4: Introduction and Strategies to Part 2
Week 5: Introduction and Strategies to Part 3
Week 6: Introduction and Strategies to Part 3
Week 7: Introduction and Strategies to Part 4
Week 8: Introduction and Strategies to Part 4
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Introduction and Strategies to Part 5
Week 11: Grammar I
Week 12: Grammar II
Week 13: Grammar III
Week 14: Introduction and Strategies to Part 6
Week 15: Introduction and Strategies to Part 7
Week 16: Introduction and Strategies to Part 7
Week 17: Introduction and Strategies to Part 7
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
School-wide English Proficiency Test: 20%
Midterm Exam: 25%  (Easy Test 線上題庫)
Final Exam: 25%  (Easy Test 線上題庫)
Attendance&Quizzes: 30%
materials: Anderson, P. (2017). TOEIC Upgrade. 文鶴. [ISBN: 9781613528280]

covid19.courseScoreMethod:
1. 評量標準不變
2. 遠距教學時，所有考試 (例如：隨堂考、期中考、期末考) 皆採線上測驗。
3. 作業或課堂練習請根據教師的指示進行繳交。(例如：於 Zuvio 或 Google form 或 Easy Test 繳交)
